description:
下面是就怎样利用好学习方法和网络来学好英语的一些建议。

1.Take It Slow放慢步调

Remember that learning a language is a gradual process - it does not happen overnight.记住，学习一门语言是一个循序渐进的过程——一夜之间学不好语言。

2.Define Objectives明确目标

Define your learning objectives early: What do you want to learn and why? 早早明确你的学习目标：你想学什么？为什么而学？

3.Choose Well正确选择

Choose your materials well. You will need reading, grammar, writing, speaking and listening materials - Beginners can use this starting English guide, intermediate to advanced learners can use this continue learning English guide.选对学习材料。你需要阅读、语法、写作、口语和听力方面的材料——初学者可以使用初级英语指南，中级和高级学习者可以使用英语进阶指南。

4.Change It Up做出改变

Vary your learning routine. It is best to do different things each day to help keep the various relationships between each area active. In other words, don't just study grammar.丰富你的学习日程。最好每天都做不同的事，从而使每个板块的联系更加活跃。也就是说，不要只钻语法。

5.Keep Friends Close亲近朋友

Find friends to study and speak with. Learning English together can be very encouraging.和朋友一起学习，一起对话。一起学英语会使你倍受鼓舞.

6.Keep It Interesting保持趣味性

Choose listening and reading materials that relate to what you are interested in. Being interested in the subject will make learning more enjoyable - thus more effective.选择你感兴趣的听力和阅读材料。有意思的主题可以让你学得更愉悦——效率随之更高。

7.Practice Grammar练习语法

Relate grammar to practical usage. Grammar by itself does not help you USE the language. You should practice what you are learning by employing it actively.将语法运用到实际中去。语法本身不能帮助你使用一门语言。你应该通过活学活用来进行练习。

8.Flex Those Muscles活动肌肉

Move your mouth! Understanding something doesn't mean the muscles of your mouth can produce the sounds. Practice speaking what you are learning aloud. It may seem strange, but it is very effective.动动嘴！理解某事并不意味着你的唇部肌肉就能将它表达出来。将你正学习的内容大声讲出来。这可能看起来很奇怪，但却十分有效。

9.Have Patience耐心

Be patient with yourself. Remember learning is a process - speaking a language well takes time. It is not a computer that is either on or off!对自己有耐心一点。记住，学习是一个过程——说好一门语言是需要时间的，它可不像一台说开就开，说关就关的电脑！

10.Communicate交流

There is nothing like communicating in English and being successful. Grammar exercises are good - having your friend on the other side of the world understand your email is fantastic!学英语如果没有交流，就没有成功。语法练习就不错——让外国朋友读懂你的邮件内容是一件很棒的事！

11.Use The Internet借助网络

The Internet is the most exciting, unlimited English resource that anyone could imagine and it is right at your finger tips.网络是最令人兴奋且不受限制的英语学习资源，一切都都触手可及的。

12.Practice!练习！

Practice, practice, practice！练习，练习，练习！
